title: subscriptions
body: Hi, is it possible to get the active subscription count added in to the console and in to downloadable reports? We can get the number of acquisitions for IAP but this doesn't tell us about how many are currently active or anything around churn. It's very difficult to work out how many active subscribers we have.

comments.body: I agree. They don't allow us to see number of cancellations also. Very bad add-on analytics from MS
